ChymeAPI provides the mechanism for a Bot to both receive messages from a Chyme conversation and respond to the user with a suitable message.

S

SalesforceEvent - Class in com.unvired.chyme.api
The SalesforceEvent class is an abstraction of a business event or trigger generated in Salesforce.com An event is the creation, updating or deletion of a business entity in Salesforce.com
SalesforceEvent() - Constructor for class com.unvired.chyme.api.SalesforceEvent
 
SAPEvent - Class in com.unvired.chyme.api
The SAPEvent class is an abstraction of a business event or trigger generated in SAP An event in SAP could be the creation, updating or deletion of a business entity in SAP.
